Text: SO I HERD U LIEK MUDKIP?

If you get the 'necemem.sni' can't be found error, its because the lcsebody.exe hasn't been cracked.

I downloaded the crack from a hongfire.com thread, it was a file called koihime.exe that I renamed and then it worked.
